title: English Reading Proficiency Improvement Program for University Students Using the CBI Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Reading Comprehension and Fundamental Understanding of Language Learning
context.additional_context: Application of the CBI (Content-Based Instruction) model via VR simulations in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment. Operated with a focus on formative assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can improve explicit information comprehension skills by 40% after six months.
Learners can enhance implicit information inference skills by 30% after six months.
Learners can improve linguistic feature utilization skills by 35% after six months.
Learners can compare theme-based CBI (Content-Based Instruction) models with other models and explain their effectiveness.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
